hero.motto: Experience the freedom of decentralized world!
hero.description: The decentralized, multifunctional communication platform that meets most of your online needs.

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: Highly innovative instant messaging includes unique features such as sending files with unlimited size, widgets, multipart messages, multiple topics within a conversation, message templates and much more.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Thanks to the integration of a crypto wallet that supports smart contracts, the platform offers advanced e-commerce features that are linked with the wallet. These include features such as: sending payments between users, making purchases in e-shops, marketplace and virtual chat, sending donations to specific purposes, supporting crowdfunding campaigns, selling video content within video channels, sending payments during live streams, topping up your own content, buying premium memberships, in-game payments and much more.

social.title: Social media
social.description: The platform offers advanced social media features such as video channels, forum, newsfeed, stories, events, virtual world, maps and more.

business.title: Business tools
business.description: Modules such as Calendar and Tasks, provide business users with an easy way to organise, share and support productivity in the work environment.

entertainment.title: Entertainment
entertainment.description: Within the platform, you can even have fun with features such as dating and video games.

box1.title: Distributed and decentralized network
box1.description:
Platform offers innovative network protocols AMTP and DMTP.

AMTP (Advanced Mail Transfer Protocol) - A next-generation, partially censorship-resistant protocol where data is stored on distributed servers and synchronized with end-user devices.

DMTP (Decentralized Mail Transfer Protocol) - An upcoming fully censorship-resistant protocol, eliminating central servers entirely and relying on decentralized storage.

box2.title: Privacy and security
box2.description: Protect your privacy and communicate safely! The platform emphasizes a high level of security, primarily through encrypted data transfer, end-to-end encryption and content digital signing, as well as providing simple and secure transfer of user's private keys across devices.

box3.title: Open source
box3.description: The client and server applications, as well as the entire set of modules, are released as open source. This ensures transparency and credibility of our project. Developers worldwide can create or integrate new modules, ensuring that the platform continually evolves.

box4.title: Modularity
box4.description: Whether you want to use the platform just for messaging or a full suite of social and e-commerce tools, the platform's modular design puts you in charge of your user experience. Choose just the features you really use.

item1.question: What is Yellow?
item1.answer: Yellow is a modern email client that utilizes the AMTP protocol to provide a more secure, reliable, and feature-rich email experience compared to traditional email clients. It's designed with a focus on user privacy, speed, and ease of use.

item4.question: Why is this software named "Yellow"?
item4.answer: The name Yellow was chosen to represent clarity, optimism, and visibility in email communications. Just as yellow is a vibrant and attention-grabbing color, our email client aims to make your important communications stand out and your email experience brighter.

item5.question: Is Yellow Client backward compatible with classic e-mail protocols (SMTP, IMAP, POP3)?
item5.answer: Yes, Yellow Client is fully backward compatible with classic email protocols including SMTP, IMAP, and POP3. This ensures you can continue to access all your existing email accounts while also enjoying the advanced features offered by AMTP for supported accounts.
